name: Flight From The Robots - Chapter 2
description:
A sci-fi escape-the-room Point & Click adventure.

It's the year 2154. The climate catastrophe has happened: Humankind had to move underground. The bots have taken control: They manage all aspects of life and boss the humans around. The few remaining human rebels don't have a chance.

Ian has collaborated with the bots. At first, this had paid off handsomely. But then something bad happened, and now Ian finds himself a fugitive. So far, he has only been able to evade the bots by a hair's breadth. He is literally out there pantless: That's where this chapter begins.

Ian is trapped and cornered on a "park deck" by a watering bot. He needs your help. Get him out of there!

The game has standard BASS controls (left-click for interacting with things; right-click for examining things).
